import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './CreateTrip.css' const CreateTrip = () => { const [trip, setTrip] = useState({id: 0, title: "", description: "", img_url: "", num_days: 0, start_date: "", end_date: "", total_cost: 0.0 }) const handleChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target; setTrip( (prev) => { return { ...prev, [name]:value, } }) } const createTrip = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); event.preventDefault() const options = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(trip) } fetch('/api/trips', options) window.location.href = '/' } return (

Plan your

Trip

) } export default CreateTrip
